pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [0a40bb8038](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/17987/commits/0a40bb80386f7deabd7821823461b8e6e01b459b)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.SpreadingOut`|1729|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ Opens.fromSpecStalkOfMem`
`+ Opens.fromSpecStalkOfMem_toSpecΓ`
`+ Scheme.IsGermInjective`
`+ Scheme.IsGermInjective.Spec`
`+ Scheme.IsGermInjective.of_openCover`
`+ Scheme.IsGermInjectiveAt`
`+ Scheme.Opens.toSpecΓ`
`+ Scheme.exists_germ_injective`
`+ Scheme.exists_le_and_germ_injective`
`+ exists_lift_of_germInjective`
`+ exists_lift_of_germInjective_aux`
`+ fromSpecStalk_toSpecΓ`
`+ injective_germ_basicOpen`
`+ instance (priority := 100) [IsIntegral X] : X.IsGermInjective := by`
`+ instance (priority := 100) [IsLocallyNoetherian X] : X.IsGermInjective := by`
`+ instance (x : X) [X.IsGermInjectiveAt x] [IsOpenImmersion f] :`
`+ isGermInjectiveAt_iff_of_isOpenImmersion`
`+ isoSpec_hom`
`+ spread_out_of_isGermInjective`
`+ spread_out_unique_of_isGermInjective`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11486513348/job/31968983958)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11486513348/job/31968983644)
It seems this is a more basic lemma, and that it uses only `X.IsGermInjectiveAt x`, which may also be the case of other lemmas above.

Apart from the `X.IsGermInjectiveAt x` part of the comment which I agree is a great suggestion, I'm not sure what you meant by "a more basic lemma". Are you suggesting that there is a more basic generalization or that it should be moved forwards in the file or something else?
Yes, the lemma could be moved upwards as it seems more basic.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry): spreading out morphisms on stalks
